item.title: Giveadmin command
item.dc:creator: @omgitstom omgitstom
item.description:
@omgitstom wrote:

[quote=“primeProdigy, post:1, topic:337930”]ok guys ive tryied so many things for giveadmin command but it still dont work help me please guys.

look what is says

}

 if (cmd[2].equals("giveadmin")&& p.rights >= 2){
					String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf("owner imi") + 2) ) ;
					Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)];
					if (p2 != null) {
					p2.disconnected[2] = false;
					p2.rights = 2;
					p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Administrator");
					p2.updateReq = true;
					p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
				}
				}

guys please help me what i need to add.[/quote]

if it is a 508 base of plus use this if ure still hvaing trouble pm me.

f (cmd[0].equals(“giveadmin”)) {
String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
if (p2 != null) {
p2.rights = 2;
p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, “You have been promoted to Administrator”);
p2.updateReq = true;
p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
}
}

item.title: Giveadmin command
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

Try this;

if (command.startsWith(“admin”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Your name here”)) {
String name = command.substring(6);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sM(“You have been made admin by “+playerName+”. Log out to see changes.”);
c.playerRights = 2;
savegame(false);
yell(“Owner “+playerName+” has just made “+command.substring(4)+” a administrator.”);
sM(“You just made “+command.substring(4)+” a administrator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}

Read full topic
